channel.description: Recent content in 2020-10 on OTTFF's Blog

item.title: [模板] 计时 Timing
item.description: 计时 Timing chrono class Timing { private: typedef chrono::time_point<std::chrono::high_resolution_clock> TP; TP current_time() { return chrono::high_resolution_clock::now(); } TP st,ed; public: void start() { st=current_time(); } void end() { ed=current_time(); } void print() { cout<<chrono::duration_cast<chrono::microseconds>(ed-st).count() <<"ms\n"; } }timing;
